name: Mdf_an - Artist Style
description:
Mdf_an - Artist Style 🎨

This Lora is trained on the calm artworks of Mdf_an, you can checkout his works on Twitter .

Usage Tips :

  • regular use is at the weight of 1 to 0.7 ,

  • adding mdf_an to the prompt will give the LoRA a tiny bit more influence.

  • try experimenting with removing quality tags like (masterpiece ) to more of that sketching effect

Samples Settings :

  • Checkpoints : AOM3 A3, anyhentai 19

  • Steps : 24 to 26

  • Sampler: DPM++ 2M Karras

  • CFG : 7
